channel.title: Challenges in education
channel.description:
Series that presents problems facing educators today. Recent subjects have been 'The Computer in Medicine,' 'Climate for Learning,' 'Teacher Unrest,' 'Teacher Evaluation,' 'Vacuum Propulsion.',This series presents problems facing educators today.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: A new approach to material research
item.description: Program number 139 talks about a group of engineers that gathered to solve mutual problems, a practice that helped many research projects.
item.dc:creator: Braswell, Charles
